resources.string: Reduce waste by being mindful of consumption habits, choosing minimal packaging, reusable water bottles, and turning off electronics.
Reuse items instead of discarding them by finding new ways to use them, like textile napkins, donating items to charity, using reusable shopping bags.
Recycle by converting waste materials into new products instead of throwing away aluminum cans, glass bottles, plastic containers, and paper products.
Are you sure you want to end the game?
In this game, your task is to sort different types of garbage into the\ncorrect bins. Get ready to test your waste management skills and\ncontribute to a cleaner environment!

Drag each item and drop it into the appropriate bin:
 Compost, Recycling, or Waste.
Pay attention to the item's characteristics, such as material, food waste,
or non-recyclable materials, to make the correct sorting decision.
